about_the_game:
Embark on an Unforgettable Journey in Kami

Dive into the enchanting world of Kami, an action roguelike game brimming with survival dynamics and now featuring a cooperative mode. Explore treacherous dungeons with your choice of character and pets, enhanced by strategic meta bonuses. Experience Kami's immersive PvE in an isometric 3D adventure that tests your survival skills.

Game Overview:

In Kami, players are thrust into a relentless battle against waves of enemies and dungeons. Choose your hero and pet companion to conquer foes using unique skills and pet attacks. Post-battle, strategize with new pet combinations, spend your gold wisely in the marketplace, and prepare for the next wave. Evolve your pets by combining them, unlocking their full potential to challenge elite enemies and formidable bosses.

Key Features:

Diverse Characters and Pets: Start with 4 unique characters, each boasting special pets and skills. Customize your duo for an optimized co-op experience.
Dynamic Battles: Engage in intense wave-based combat, culminating in epic boss fights. Adapt, survive, and conquer.
Pet Evolution: Combine pets to evolve them, unlocking new and powerful abilities that change the tide of battle.

Set out on a rogue-like adventure in Kami, where strategic teamwork and daring adventures await. Are you ready to conquer the unknown?

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7 or newer, 64-bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i3-6100 / AMD FX-8350
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX 580 / AMD HD 7870
  • Storage: 2 GB available space

short_description: Embark on the ultimate adventure in "Kami," a game that seamlessly blends action-packed roguelike exploration with deep strategic elements. Navigate through ever-evolving dungeons, harness the power of unique pets through evolution, and unlock extraordinary abilities.
